title: Analyze Drone Inspection Imagery of Wind Turbine Blades
description: An asset inspector is reviewing high-resolution images from a drone inspection of a wind turbine blade to identify and classify defects.

tasks.description: Process and stitch together the thousands of images from the drone flight to create a complete 3D model of the blade.
Automatically scan the imagery for common defects like cracks, erosion, and lightning damage using a computer vision model.
tasks.expected_outcome: The AI model flags three potential areas of concern.

tasks.description: Classify the severity of the identified defects according to industry standards and recommend whether immediate repair is needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent classifies two defects as minor erosion but one as a Category 3 crack requiring repair within 6 months.
